scripts.dev:hooks: cd apps/hooks && uv run python -m pytest tests/ --watch
scripts.build: npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:hooks
scripts.test: npm run test:dashboard && npm run test:hooks
scripts.test:hooks: cd apps/hooks && uv run python -m pytest
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:dashboard && npm run test:coverage:hooks
scripts.test:coverage:hooks: cd apps/hooks && uv run python -m pytest --cov=src --cov-report=json --cov-report=html --cov-report=lcov
scripts.lint: npm run lint:dashboard && npm run lint:hooks
scripts.lint:hooks: cd apps/hooks && uv run flake8 src tests
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run coverage:check
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run test
